lyrics:
6 ContributorsMTV Unplugged in New York [Liner Notes] LyricsKurt Cobain: guitar, vocals
Krist Novoselic: bass, accordian on "Jesus Doesn't Want Me For A Sunbeam," guitar on "Plateau,""Oh Me" and "Lake Of Fire"
Dave Grohl: drums, vocals, bass on "Jesus Doesn't Want Me For A Sunbeam"
Pat Smear: guitar
Lori Goldston: cello on tracks 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 13 and 14
Curt Kirkwood: guitar on tracks 10, 11 and 12
Cris Kirkwood: guitar on tracks 10 and 11, bass on track 12, and back-up vocals on tracks 10 and 12
MTV
Executive Producer: Joel Stillerman
Produced by Alex Coletti
Directed by Beth McCarthy
MTV Unplugged series created by: Bob Small and Jim Burns
Sound
Produced by Nirvana and Scott Litt
Mixed at Louie's Clubhouse
Recorded for MTV's "Unplugged" at Sony
Studio, New York, NY on November 18, 1993
Mastered by Stephen Marcussen at
Precision Mastering Los Angeles, CA
A&R Mark Kates
Management: Gold Mountain Entertainment

These People Made This Recording Much Easier:
Janet Billig, Bethann Buddenbaum, John Cannelli, Rosemary Carroll,
Alex Coletti, John Cutcliffe, Mike Dalke, Big John Duncan, Amy Finnerty,
Danny Goldberg, Lee Johnson, Mark Kates, Rick Krim, Scott Litt,
Alex MacLeod, Jeff Mason, Judy McGrath, Michael Meisel, Kelly Nase,
Our Families, Shauna O'Brien, John Silva, Cathryn Suko, Jim Vincent
All Songe Written by Kurt Cobain and Published by EMI-Virgin Songs, Inc./The End
Of Music BMI except "Jesus Doesn't Want Me For A Sunbeam" Written by Eugene
Kelly/Francis McKee and Published by EMI-Blackwood Music Inc. on befalf of EMI
Music Publishing Ltd./Complete Music Ltd. administered by Incomplete Music Inc.
BMI, "The Man Who Sold The World" Written by David Bowie and Published by
Tintoretto Music/Screen Gems-EMI/Chrysalis Songs BMI, "Oh Me," "Plateau"
and "Lake Of Fire" Written by Curt Kirkwood and Published by Meat Puppets
Music BMI and "Where Did You Sleep Last Night" Written by Huddie
Ledbetter and Published by Folkways Music Publishers, Inc. BMI
Curt Kirkwood and Cris Kirkwood Appear Courtesy of London Records.

Photography: Jennifer Youngblood-Grohl, Frank MicelottaEmbed

Oh and here's a donation basket for one supply of Leadbelly's guitar

Passing a basket
Yeah, I even asked David Geffen personally if he'd buy it for me. He wouldn't do it

I'm going where the cold wind blows
